column4: felix: run an old distro?  Red Hat Linux 4 or 5 might have used libc5
felix: Don't know what Ubuntu (if any) had libc5
thing is I created this virtual machine with Ubuntu 8.04 32bit to play this stupid game because it wouldn't run on my 64 bit host...
: I found old libc5 .deb but it's for 5.04 or something..
